title: I want to become a Moderator

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I want to apply to become a Forums Moderator for Unity

sections.title: Cause
content: We get many requests from users old and new at Unity wanting to become a Forum Moderator.

sections.title: Resolution
content: We do not have a process in place in which Forum users can apply to become a moderator. Our Community Managers will approach those users who are exceedingly helpful and have a great online presence to become Moderators if positions are available.
